subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/testing your abilities-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : I was looking around on my desktop and found this file I had fotgotten about. I asked to speak with Big Charles again. This is the responce I got (my voice is not in this clip) I only converted the wav file to mp3 here. No other mods. Lets see if you can figure out what he says :) I have no doubt was is said here. So I get to be the "judge"  :-p 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/testing%20your%20abilities-evp.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
